resources.name: sign up

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Definición del MIME type del request.

resources.name: User Routing
resources.description:
# Carpeta de rutas utilizadas para métodos relacionados al usuario
La siguiente carpeta contiene todas aquellas requests que se encargan de la lógica de negocios correspondientes al usuario.

resources.name: sign in

params.name: identifier
params.description: Campo de identificador de usuario (puede ser el username o el correo)

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Definición del MIME type del request.

resources.name: who am i
resources.description:
Request encargada de devolver los datos del usuario que se encuentra logeado en la página.

```response:200
{
	"_id": "6385a71a8dc445b10608a75d",
	"username": "Pamela",
	"email": "00170221@uca.edu.sv",
	"roles": [
		"user",
		"sysadmin"
	],
	"description": "Soy una persona feliz."
}
```

resources.name: create

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Definición del MIME type del request.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Token de autorización de creación de post.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Token de autorización de logeo de usuario.

resources.name: get saved posts
resources.description:
Request encargada de encontrar todos los posts guardados por el usuario que se encuentra logeado en el momento de la consulta. No devuelve posts que han sido ocultados.

```response:200
{
	"posts": [
		{
			"_id": "638619043cfaa3a547edf365",
			"title": "Post test 01",
			"description": "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.",
			"image": "https://concepto.de/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/paisaje-800x409.jpg",
			"hidden": false,
			"user": "638617fa3cfaa3a547edf314",
			"likes": [],
			"createdAt": "2022-11-29T14:36:52.620Z",
			"updatedAt": "2022-11-29T14:36:52.620Z",
			"__v": 0
		}
	]
}
```

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Token de autorización de logeo de usuario.

resources.name: find post by user ID
resources.description:

headers.name: Authorization

resources.name: find post by post ID
resources.description:
Request encargada de encontrar un post por medio de su identificador. No devuelve posts ocultados.

```response:200
{
	"post": {
		"_id": "638619043cfaa3a547edf365",
		"title": "Post test 01",
		"description": "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.",
		"image": "https://concepto.de/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/paisaje-800x409.jpg",
		"hidden": false,
		"user": {
			"_id": "638617fa3cfaa3a547edf314",

			"username": "Antonio Pinea"
		},
		"likes": [],

		"updatedAt": "2022-11-29T14:36:52.620Z",
		"__v": 0
	}
}
```
